title: so when are they nerfing fizz
body: http://gyazo.com/42ebcc86c39ca47d4ee4747eb2edf79e  i mean this silver 1 r%%%%% can only win on that one champion just like everyone else hey prob not broken?

replies.body: No reason to nerf a balanced Champ. He´s fairly easy to counterplay in most matchups and his teamfighting is sub-par till very late into the game. He´s just a very good snowballer for SoloQ, but there are worse offenders in that category.
